titleStmt.title: An act enabling the militia of the City of London to raise horse vvithin the said city and liberties for defence of the Parliament, City of London, and liberties thereof, and the parts adjacent.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Order to print dated: Die Martis, 4 Iunii, 1650. Signed: Hen. Scobell Cler. Parliament.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library.
